lead_paragraph: As local and Federal authorities worked yesterday to determine the scope of a terrorist bomb plot uncovered in Brooklyn, officials tightened security measures at transportation hubs, city landmarks and Jewish institutions and sought to reassure a jittery public. Police Commissioner Howard Safir said extra law enforcement officers would patrol specific areas across the metropolitan area.

headline.main: Police Pledge Extra Patrols And Assure City of Safety

abstract: Officials tighten security at transportation hubs, city landmarks and Jewish institutions to reasure New Yorkers following arrest of Palestinian bomb-makers (S)
